General.Name: HY Energy Group Co Ltd
General.Description: HY Energy Group Co.,Ltd, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the storage, wholesale and retail of gasoline, diesel, and liquefied gas in China. It also engages in equity investment and property investment; wharf loading and unloading of oil products and liquid chemicals; production and processing of lithium carbonate; and warehousing and trading activities. The company was formerly known as Zhejiang Haiyue Co., Ltd. HY Energy Group Co.,Ltd was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Zhuji, China.

2.Name: Ms. Jia  Zeng
2.Title: Vice Chairman & Sec. of the Board
